summary: The diff updates project_state.json to describe new/changed visuals and strict asset-validation behaviors, but it does not clearly implement the BuildRequest constraint to use only "/logo2-1.png" for the centered hub logo; instead, it repeatedly references "logo2.png" and introduces additional unrequested asset validation/scan UI behaviors.

missing_requirements.requirement: Do not reference or load the centered hub logo from any filename other than "/logo2-1.png".
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary and listed feature titles continue to reference "logo2.png" (not "/logo2-1.png") as the centered hub logo asset.
evidence: project_state.json: summary mentions "logo2-1.png" but feature titles/asset lists reference "logo2.png"
project_state.json: existing_features includes "Render logo2.png as a large, dominant, fixed centerpiece..."
project_state.json: existing_features includes strict asset validation for exact filenames "logo2.png, jacques-johnson.png, ..."

missing_requirements.requirement: Do not introduce placeholder images or substitute alternative assets if the required logo asset is missing.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show placeholder substitution, but it also does not show the required "no-substitute" behavior specifically for "/logo2-1.png"; instead, it frames missing-asset behavior around different filenames (e.g., "logo2.png").
evidence: project_state.json: strict validation feature refers to missing assets for "logo2.png" (not "/logo2-1.png")

hallucinated_features.description: Strict startup asset validation for multiple exact filenames (logo2.png, jacques-johnson.png, kream-kuntree.png, rl-stafford.png) with a full-screen blocking missing-asset overlay.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only constrains the centered hub logo filename ("/logo2-1.png") and explicitly says no backend changes / no broader scene changes beyond the centered hub logo filename. Multi-asset validation/overlay behavior is not requested.
evidence: project_state.json: existing_features REQ-1 title "Implement strict startup asset validation..." with overlay text

hallucinated_features.description: Blocking asset scan results screen requiring explicit user continue before rendering the theatre scene.
hallucinated_features.reason: No acceptance criteria or requirements request an asset scan results screen or gating the scene behind a continue step.
evidence: project_state.json: existing_features includes "present a blocking asset scan results screen... require the user to explicitly continue..." (truncated but clearly stated)

hallucinated_features.description: Additional theatre/stage environment visuals requirements (curtains, seats, aisle lights, rigging, volumetric beams) and background silhouette logo behavior described as formal features/REQs.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals state no changes to theatre/stage scene visuals beyond ensuring the centered hub logo uses the correct filename.
evidence: project_state.json: existing_features REQ-2 theatre/stage environment spec
project_state.json: existing_features REQ-4 background silhouette/shadow version of logo2.png
